__e: M'lady, I hope you don't mind, but I would like to know whether I'm staying or going.
No, milady. I would go so far as to say there is no food on the earth that is supposed to look like that!
My lady, I am a hero, and heroes know that things must happen when it is time for them to happen.
Forgive me, my lady, but, well, you don't get it.
That's very kind of you, milady, but do you think you should?
I do not know your son, my lady. But I could serve you, if you would have me.
